name: MUST
column5: mean that the definition is an absolute requirement of the specification.'

name: MUST NOT
column5: mean that the definition is an absolute prohibition of the specification.'

name: SHOULD
column5: mean that there may exist valid reasons in particular circumstances to ignore a particular item
column6: but the full implications must be understood and carefully weighed before choosing a different course.'

name: SHOULD NOT
column4: or the phrase "NOT RECOMMENDED" mean that there may exist valid reasons in particular circumstances when the particular behavior is acceptable or even useful
column5: but the full implications should be understood and the case carefully weighed before implementing any behavior described with this label.'

name: MAY
column5: mean that an item is truly optional.'
